attributes.action: Hold MP's accountable for their conduct in the houses of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Any MP's falling foul of three strikes should be forced into a by election in their constituencies so that their electorate can decide whether they want these people representing them further in the house of commons.
attributes.background: We are sick of seeing our elected representatives behaving like braying adolescents and would like to see a disciplinary process put in place to deal with individuals who behave in this disrespectful manner, with a 3 strike system that could result in them being banned from the house of commons.
